title: NO LP Gas distribution today (25)
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Litro gas announced that it is NOT be distributing domestic cooking gas cylinders on Wednesday (25) and requested the public NOT to wait in line.
Meanwhile, the Consumer Affairs Authority said that raids have been intensified against those who sell gas at higher prices and hide gas cylinders.
The Authority also stated that legal action has been taken against several such persons.
World Bank does not plan to offer new financing to Sri Lanka until policies in place
